title: Lihzahrd
summaries: The Lihzahrd is an enemy found only inside the Jungle Temple that initially behaves like an ordinary walking fighter. However, as soon as its health is reduced to below 55% (220 / 440 / 660), it enters its second, crawling form, which consists of a more lizard-like quadrupedal creature. In this form, the Lihzahrd is much faster, has additional damage and defense, and is immune to knockback, but has reduced jump height.
